name: AWS Bill PDF Converter
description: Convert an Amazon Web Services (AWS) bill from PDF form at to a spreadsheet-friendly CSV file.

name: Chat Agent with Memory
description: Deploy a customizable Q&A chat agent configured with conversation memory, a ruleset driver, and a knowledge base tool.

name: Natural Language Spreadsheet Filter
description: Create a knowledge base from a CSV file, using natural language semantic filtering to select which columns to include.

name: Text Replacement Tool
description: Find and replace words and phrases in a text input, to demonstrate using structures to perform ETL transforms.

name: OpenAI vs. Google vs. Anthropic Model Comparison
description: Easily switch LLMs to run head-to-head comparisons between OpenAI GPT, Google Gemini, and Anthropic Claude.

name: Observability of LLMs and Agents
description: Deploy an agent configured with an observability driver that records performance metrics and event traces.

name: Off-Prompt(TM) Website Summarizer
description: Scrape a web page, write its contents to task memory, and control whether the LLM can access it to generate a summary.

name: LangChain App
description: Run LangChain code in Griptape Cloud, in this case a basic mathematical calculator.
